citation: Justice and Related Legislation Miscellaneous Amendments Act 2023 (Tas)
text:
Justice and Related Legislation Miscellaneous Amendments Act 2023

An Act to amend the Animal Welfare Act 1993 , the Births, Deaths and Marriages Registration Act 1999 , the Coroners Act 1995 , the Criminal Code Act 1924 , the Dangerous Criminals and High Risk Offenders Act 2021 , the Monetary Penalties Enforcement Act 2005 , the Sex Industry Offences Act 2005 and the Traffic Act 1925
[Royal Assent 13 June 2023]

Be it enacted by Her Excellency the Governor of Tasmania, by and with the advice and consent of the Legislative Council and House of Assembly, in Parliament assembled, as follows:

PART 1 - Preliminary

1. Short title
    This Act may be cited as the Justice and Related Legislation Miscellaneous Amendments Act 2023 .

2. Commencement
    This Act commences on the day on which this Act receives the Royal Assent.

PART 2 - Animal Welfare Act 1993 Amended

3.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Animal Welfare Act 1993 .

4.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Animal Welfare Act 1993 .

PART 3 - Births, Deaths and Marriages Registration Act 1999 Amended

5.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Births, Deaths and Marriages Registration Act 1999 .

6.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Births, Deaths and Marriages Registration Act 1999 .

7.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Births, Deaths and Marriages Registration Act 1999 .

PART 4 - Coroners Act 1995 Amended

8.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Coroners Act 1995 .

9.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Coroners Act 1995 .

10.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Coroners Act 1995 .

PART 5 - Criminal Code Act 1924 Amended

11.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Criminal Code Act 1924 .

12.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Criminal Code Act 1924 .

PART 6 - Dangerous Criminals and High Risk Offenders Act 2021 Amended

13.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Dangerous Criminals and High Risk Offenders Act 2021 .

14.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Dangerous Criminals and High Risk Offenders Act 2021 .

PART 7 - Monetary Penalties Enforcement Act 2005 Amended

15.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Monetary Penalties Enforcement Act 2005 .

16.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Monetary Penalties Enforcement Act 2005 .

PART 8 - Sex Industry Offences Act 2005 Amended

17.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Sex Industry Offences Act 2005 .

18.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Sex Industry Offences Act 2005 .

PART 9 - Traffic Act 1925 Amended

19.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Traffic Act 1925 .

20.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Traffic Act 1925 .

PART 10 - Repeal of Act

21. Repeal of Act
    This Act is repealed on the first anniversary of the day on which it commenced.
